title: Buffer to String Conversion
description: This function converts a specified range of bytes from a buffer into a string representation. The function takes a pointer to a byte array and parameters indicating the size of the buffer, the start, and stop indices for the conversion. It performs bounds checking and ensures the final string does not exceed the predefined maximum string length before terminating the string.
name: BUFFER_TO_STRING

input.name: PT
input.description: A pointer to the byte array that contains the data to be converted to a string.

input.name: SIZE
input.description: The total size of the byte array pointed to by PT.

input.name: START
input.description: The starting index in the byte array from which to begin the conversion.

input.name: STOP
input.description: The stopping index in the byte array at which to end the conversion.

output.name: string
output.description: The resulting string obtained from the specified range of the byte buffer.

return_value.description: The final string after converting the bytes from the buffer.
